bibl.title: A New Look at the di ‘nḫ Formula.
Acts of the Tenth International Congress of Demotic Studies. Leuven, 26-30 August 2008.

bibl.note: Explores a religious formula common in votive offerings with Demotic inscriptions. - Orthography. - Grammar. - Coptic ⲧⲁⲛϩⲟ. - Temple inscriptions. - Interpretation. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: John Gee, A New Look at the di ‘nḫ Formula.

Mark Depauw & Yanne Broux (edd.), Acts of the Tenth International Congress of Demotic Studies. Leuven, 26-30 August 2008 = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 231 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2014) pp. 73-82.
Explores a religious formula common in votive offerings with Demotic inscriptions. - Orthography. - Grammar. - Coptic ⲧⲁⲛϩⲟ. - Temple inscriptions. - Interpretation. - Conclusions.
